001.comments: If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - FIST 430, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

WL1.comments: This is a WAIT LIST section for FIST 430, Section 001. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

description: A seminar examining the work of one or more directors, such as John Ford, Francois Truffaut, Denys Arcand, Margarethe Von Trotta, or of a screenwriter over many films.
